typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EDLPExtractId as string,
		accountcreatedby as string,
		AccountId as string,
		accountmodifiedby as string,
		AccountName as string,
		AccountNumber as string,
		AddressId as string,
		CID as string,
		City as string,
		clanumber as string,
		Country as string,
		CreatedById as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		createdonbehalfby as string,
		CrmInstanceId as string,
		CurrencyId as string,
		CustomerSegment as integer,
		CustomerSubsegment as integer,
		Description as string,
		dsraction as string,
		dsrdate as timestamp,
		dsrticket as string,
		DunsID as string,
		EligibleForUnifiedSupport as boolean,
		EndCustomerSegment as string,
		EndCustomerSegmentSeqNo as long,
		EndCustomerSubsegment as string,
		EndCustomerSubsegmentSeqNo as long,
		englishtranslatedaccountname as string,
		Fax as string,
		FYStartMonth as string,
		FYStartMonthcode as integer,
		FYStartMonthSeqNo as long,
		GPID as string,
		GPName as string,
		HardwareBuyingStrategy as string,
		HardwareDecisionMaker as string,
		Industry as string,
		IndustryCode as integer,
		IndustrySeqNo as long,
		IndustryVertical as string,
		IndustryVerticalCode as integer,
		IndustryVerticalSeqNo as long,
		isvtechaptitude as string,
		isvtechaptitudecode as integer,
		isvtechaptitudeSeqNo as long,
		LicenseAgreementType as string,
		LicenseAgreementTypeCode as integer,
		LicenseAgreementTypeSeqNo as long,
		Line1 as string,
		Line2 as string,
		Line3 as string,
		MainPhone as string,
		Managedstatus as string,
		ManagedstatusCode as integer,
		ManagedstatusSeqNo as long,
		mcapi as string,
		MDMOrganizationId as string,
		ModifiedById as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		modifiedonbehalfby as string,
		MSP_HQ as boolean,
		msp_IncomingATS as string,
		msp_OutgoingATS as string,
		MSSalesId as string,
		MSSalesTopParentId as string,
		NumberOfEmployees as integer,
		OdsCreatedDate as timestamp,
		OdsModifiedDate as timestamp,
		OdsStatus as integer,
		OEMManaged as boolean,
		oemorganizationtype as string,
		oemorganizationtypecode as integer,
		oemorganizationtypeSeqNo as long,
		oemsegmenttype as string,
		oemsegmenttypecode as integer,
		oemsegmenttypeSeqNo as long,
		OwnerId as string,
		owningBusinessUnit as string,
		ParentAccountId as string,
		ParentingLevel as string,
		ParentingLevelCode as integer,
		ParentingLevelSeqNo as long,
		PcCount as integer,
		pevcinvestors as string,
		pevcownedSeqNo as long,
		PonId as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		previousaccountowner as string,
		ServerCount as integer,
		ServicesEngagement as boolean,
		SmartphoneCount as integer,
		StateCode as integer,
		StateOrProvince as string,
		Status as string,
		StatusCode as integer,
		StatusReason as string,
		StatusReasonSeqNo as long,
		StatusSeqNo as long,
		TabletCount as integer,
		TaxId as string,
		TenantId as integer,
		TerritoryId as string,
		VersionNumber as long,
		VerticalCategory as string,
		VerticalCategoryCode as integer,
		VerticalCategorySeqNo as long,
		WebsiteUrl as string,
		pevcownedcode as integer,
		EDLPExtractDateTime as timestamp,
		EDLPLoadTS as string,
		EDLPModifiedDateTime as timestamp,
		EDLPDeltaActionCode as string,
		ExtractId as string,
		ExtractDateTime as timestamp,
		LoadTS as timestamp,
		DeltaActionCode as string,
		PlatformCreatedDate as timestamp,
		PlatformModifiedDate as timestamp,
		PlatformModifiedDateAsInt as long,
		msp_accountplanid as string,
		msp_verticalcode as integer,
		msp_subverticalcode as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'cseo',
	folderPath: 'standardized/masterandreference/msx/hub_vw_account/v1/standard') ~> msxaccount
source(output(
		TPID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'excel',
	fileSystem: 'input',
	fileName: 'partnerledammptpid.xlsx',
	sheetName: 'Sheet1',
	firstRowAsHeader: true) ~> source1
msxaccount, source1 exists(MSSalesTopParentId == TPID,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> AsMSSalesTopParentID
msxaccount, source1 exists(MSSalesId == TPID,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> AsMSSalesID
AsMSSalesTopParentID, AsMSSalesID union(byName: true)~> union1
union1 select(mapColumn(
		AccountName,
		CustomerSegment,
		Industry,
		MSSalesTopParentId,
		MSSalesId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
